name: Youtube - HD, 720p
description:
Changes the resolution of the video in the enlarged video player to 1280x720px. This only affects the player when it is in wide mode.

-------------------------
Update Log:             
-------------------------
Jan 27: Fixed playlists for the most part. I forgot to upload the script for a month sorry.

Dec 6: Fix for site update, playlists are currently bugged.

Jul 6: Fixed script to resize player

Jun 12: Fixed a bug due to some changes youtube made which caused the video to resize but not the flash player.
